name: Blackmatch
description:
Blackmatch is a blackjack game but with higher risks and rewards. 

You will see only some parts of numbers so it means that you will have less control on your summary points.

Numbers on cards almost look like zip code numbers.

The higher difficulty - the less parts of the number is revealed, and the higher reward waits.

Use your special abilities to win. You pick abilities for free, but usage costs money.

EVOLVE your intuition and observation skills for the win.

Become the richest man in the Noir city!

Made for ScoreSpace Jam #24
